shortDescription.default: MonarchNav: Modern, branded navigation for SharePoint Online.

longDescription.default: MonarchNav is a professionally branded SharePoint Framework (SPFx) Application Customizer that delivers a modern, customizable navigation bar for SharePoint Online. Features include logo branding, theme customization, hierarchical navigation, and a user-friendly configuration experience.
